sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"持续"之意。
means: persist ： 强调超过了指定的或正常的时间。
last ： 着重存在的时间相当长，超过正常的或所期望的时间。
endure与last同义，但还指经受住，有能耐忍受而并不受损。
continue ： 多指过程，强调持续而无终止，常含不间断之意。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"忍受"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: stand, bear, endure, tolerate, suffer, abide, withstand
means: stand ： 口语用词，常可与bear换用，但前者侧重指经受得起，后者强调容忍，是普通用语。
endure ： 书面用词，指长时间忍受痛苦和不幸，着重体力或意志力的坚强不屈服。
tolerate ： 指以自我克制的态度，对待令人反感或厌恶的东西，含默认宽容意味。
suffer ： 通常指非自愿或被迫忍受各种痛苦、困难或不快，强调受到苦难。
abide ： 指忍受长期的痛苦或折磨，强调耐心和屈从。多用于否定句和疑问句中。
withstand ： 指因具有一定实力、权力或能力而能忍受某种情况。

sentence.Network_en: Then something seemed to snap in me. I couldn't endure any more.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时候，我的心里像有个东西突然绷断了——我再也忍受不了啦。

sentence.Network_en: They endure as masterworks of American musical theatre.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们作为美国音乐剧舞台上的杰作流芳于世。

sentence.Network_en: They had to endure a long wait before the case came to trial.
sentence.Network_cn: 在此案审理前他们只得忍受长时间的等待。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French endurer, from Latin indurare 'harden', from in- 'in' + durus 'hard'

entry.def: If you endure a painful or difficult situation, you experience it and do not avoid it or give up, usually because you cannot.

example.ex: The company endured heavy financial losses.
example.tran: 那家公司遭受了严重亏损。

example.ex: ...unbearable pain, which they had to endure in solitude because not even the doctors could get near them.
example.tran: 他们不得不独自承受的无法忍受的疼痛，因为甚至连医生都无法靠近他们

entry.def: If something endures, it continues to exist without any loss in quality or importance.

example.ex: Somehow the language endures and continues to survive.
example.tran: 那种语言以某种方式保存下来，并继续存在下去。

means.word_mean: 1. put up with something or somebody unpleasant;

sentences.sentence: "The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks"
"She stuck out two years in a miserable marriage"

means.word_mean: 3. continue to live; endure or last;

sentences.sentence: "We went without water and food for 3 days"
"These superstitions survive in the backwaters of America"
"The racecar driver lived through several very serious accidents"
"This dress wore well for almost ten years"

means.word_mean: 6. persist or be long; in time;

sentences.sentence: "The bad weather lasted for three days"

auth_sentence.content: This great nation will endure as it has endured.
auth_sentence.res_content: This great nation will endure as it has endured.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This great nation will endure as it has endured.

auth_sentence.content: She had only to endure and trust in God.
auth_sentence.res_content: She had only to endure and trust in God.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She had only to endure and trust in God.

auth_sentence.content: The world will endure more generations of lowered potential.
auth_sentence.res_content: The world will endure more generations of lowered potential.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The world will endure more generations of lowered potential.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dour=dur心硬不为所动→adj.冷酷的,严厉的
dur持久,延续,坚硬+able……的→adj.持久的,耐久的
ob加强+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate……的→加强硬→顽固
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ation表名词→n.持久;期间;持续时间
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ess表名词或动词→硬压→强迫
endure[v.忍受,持久,持续]+ance表名词→n.忍耐[力],持久[力],耐久[性]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在……的期间, 在……的时候
stems_affixes.word_buile: dur延续+ing状态→prep.在……的期间, 在……的时候
in进入+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate使……→使成为坚硬
per贯穿+dur持久+e→v.持久, 继续

Sentence.sentence: To what extent are Americans really willing to endure the environmental impacts of domestic energy production in order to cut back imports?
Those factors are more than enough to make up for the squalor (肮脏), disease and spectacular poverty that those same migrants must often at first endure when they become urban dwellers.

means.word_mean: (长时间地)忍受, 忍耐, 容忍

sentences.en: I cannot endure her rudeness any longer.
sentences.cn: 我再也不能忍受她的无礼了。

sentences.en: I cannot endure you should say that.
sentences.cn: 你竟然说出那种话真让人受不了。

means.word_mean: 持续, 持久, 坚持下去

sentences.en: We can't endure much longer in the desert without water.
sentences.cn: 我们没有水无法在沙漠中坚持长久。

jushi.english: If help does not come,we must endure to the end.
jushi.chinese: 如无援助到来,那我们必须坚持到底。

jushi.english: He is a great writer and his books will endure forever
jushi.chinese: 他是一个伟大的作家,他写的书将流芳百世。

jushi.english: We can't endure much longer in this desert without water.
jushi.chinese: 我们没有水无法在沙漠中坚持长久。
